item.title: Heart Failure Prediction
item.description: This GitHub repository is a Data Science Project attempting to predict Heart Failure among patients. Heart failure is a progressive condition in which the heart is unable to pump enough blood to meet the bodyâ€™s oxygen demand. Cardiovascular disease causes 17.9 million deaths per year, making it the leading cause of death globally. Additionally, heart disease cost the United States $363 billion in 2016 due to health care services, medicine, and lost productivity.
